rukus.text: walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalayka warahmatuhu lahammat taifatun min'hum an yudilluka wama yudilluna illa anfusahum wama yadurrunaka min shayin wa-anzala l-lahu ʿalayka l-kitaba wal-hik'mata waʿallamaka ma lam takun taʿlamu wakana fadlu l-lahi ʿalayka ʿaziman
la khayra fi kathirin min najwahum illa man amara bisadaqatin aw maʿrufin aw is'lahin bayna l-nasi waman yafʿal dhalika ib'tighaa mardati l-lahi fasawfa nu'tihi ajran ʿaziman
waman yushaqiqi l-rasula min baʿdi ma tabayyana lahu l-huda wayattabiʿ ghayra sabili l-mu'minina nuwallihi ma tawalla wanus'lihi jahannama wasaat masiran
